column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////It's everything I want from a restaurant. My new go to
column2: I wish I would have found you sooner. Food was fast and delicious. Service was amazing
column3: the lighting and decor were PERFECT. Passion fruit sangria =dangerously delicious. My favorite dishes were the garlic shrimp and the garlic potato salad. I almost don't want to write a review so I can keep this restaurant all to myself.
